metadata.title: CVE-2020-35525 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In SQlite 3.31.1, a potential null pointer derreference was found in theINTERSEC query processing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.37.2-2
libsqlite3-0 - 3.37.2-2
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.37.2-2
sqlite3 - 3.37.2-2
sqlite3-tools - 3.37.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
sqlite3 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.37.2-2').
